{{also|證明書|证明书}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|めい|しょ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Probably from {{der|ja|ltc|sort=しょうめいしょ|-}} compound {{m|zh|證明書|tr={{IPAchar|/t͡ɕiᴇŋ<sup>H</sup> mˠiæŋ ɕɨʌ/}}|lit=to prove, to verify + clear + letter, document}}.  Compare modern {{cog|cmn|證明書}} reading ''zhèngmíngshū''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しょうめいしょ|acc=5|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=0|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうめいしょ|kyu=證明書}}

# [[certificate]]

====Usage notes====
This refers more specifically to an official document used to certify or prove something.

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|価格証明書|かかく しょうめいしょ}}: a {{l|en|certificate}} of {{l|en|value}}
* {{ja-r|資格証明書|しかく しょうめいしょ}}: a {{l|en|certificate}} of {{l|en|qualification}}
* {{ja-r|死亡証明書|しぼう しょうめいしょ}}: a {{l|en|certificate}} of {{l|en|death}}, a {{l|en|death}} {{l|en|certificate}}, a {{l|en|death}} {{l|en|warrant}}
* {{ja-r|出産証明書|しゅっさん しょうめいしょ}}: a {{l|en|certificate}} of {{l|en|birth}}, a {{l|en|birth}} {{l|en|certificate}}
* {{ja-r|身分証明書|みぶん しょうめいしょ}}: {{l|en|identification}}, an {{l|en|identification}} {{l|en|card}}, {{l|en|identification}} {{l|en|paper}}s
* {{ja-r|旅行証明書|りょこう しょうめいしょ}}: {{l|en|travel}} {{l|en|documents}}
{{der-bottom}}
